titles: The power of the civil magistrate in matters of religion vindicated the extent of his power determined in a sermon preached before the first Parliament on a monthly fast day / by ... Mr. Stephen Marshall ... / published by G. Firmin ... with notes upon the sermon.
author: Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
Firmin, Giles, 1614-1697.
publisher: Printed for Nathaniel Webb and William Grantham ...,
notes: Running title reads: The civil magistrates power in matters of religion, vindicated.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Serminary Library, New York.
keywords: Church and state --  Church of England.
